name: Guardians of Gemstones
summary:
▶Enjoy the Epic Story◀ 
Collect all the epic heroes and unleash their power as you fight your way to victory! All Heroes have their own, unique, and special stories! 
 
▶Collect the Awesome & Unique Heroes◀ 
More than 150 heroes that are beautifully animated and part of a gorgeous world. 
Collect the awesome Elf archers, Human mages, Dragons and much more! Huge variety of classes and races! 
 
▶Fun Battle System◀ 
Freeze enemies, wrap them in vines or light them on fire! Eye-catching super 4 vs 4 combat with heroes in legendary turn-based battles! 
 
▶Develop Skills & Gears◀ 
Find rare and legendary artifacts that can help your heroes in battle. 
Collect Skill books to unlock new and powerful skills. 
Gather Hero Tokens to level up and become stronger! Assemble the most epic team of heroes! 
 
▶Take the Battle Worldwide◀ 
Fight through weekly leagues! Complete daily, weekly and season missions! Play against people and friends around the world and challenge for the top stop! 
 
▶Rewards◀ 
Epic rewards for effort! Play to recieve rewards like weekly prizes based on your rank! 
 
▶Fun all the Time◀ 
Complete daily quests, expand your collection and dive into the epic backstory of the Guardians of Gemstones.
